introduction: The Neighbors executive producer Aaron Kaplan is back at ABC with another single-camera neighborhood comedy. ABC has given a put pilot commitment to Neighbors Of North Sycamore, from writer Ryan Raddatz (The Crazy Ones) and Kaplan’s Kapital Entertainment.Penned by Raddatz, Neighbors Of North Sycamore follows a millennial couple who buy their first house only to discover they’re living on a block where privacy is a myth, and everyone’s drama plays out 24/7 on the street’s secret Facebook page.
